main.name: Greg Rodriguez
main.description: I go above and beyond on any project and put value in my team
main.bio: I am driven by the evolution of technology and what it brings to modern day. I enjoy engaging in new knowledge and acquiring life and fun needed skills.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm skilled with a variety of languages, applications, and tools

education.description: Developed strong skills on how to build dynamic end-to-end applications. Proficient in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, mySQL, Command Line, Git.
Studied and researched general health sciences.

work.title: Journeyman, Surveyor
work.description: Worked alongside large teams and individuals on various commercial development sites around the state of Utah including projects like the new Salt Lake City International Airport, Facebook database, and Hill Field Airforce Base.

projects.title: Track your fitness
projects.category: Input and view your fitness data

projects.title: My Reading List
projects.category: Compile your own personal reading list from an API

projects.title: Color Study Palette
projects.category: This website gathers information about peoples personal color palette and displays the averege results

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: A weather app that allows users to enter location and display real time weather conditions

projects.title: Budget Tracker App
projects.category: (Compatible offline) A downloadable budget app that allows users to log and enter expenses

testimonials.text: Greg puts 100% into any project he works on. He has a creative mind and great attention to detail.
I worked with Greg on a project in 2019. He motivated our team to go above and beyond. Greg was a great leader and I would highly recommend him for any future project.
